# ScreenFusion — AI-Powered Digital Signage CMS

> ScreenFusion is an AI-powered, multi-site digital signage CMS built for retail and hospitality chains, offering Canva integration, AI demographic profiling, touchscreen web design tools, and dynamic pricing integrations.

## About
- Company: ScreenFusion (Guaranteed Irish, headquartered in Ireland)
- Founded: 2020
- Website: https://www.screenfusion.ai
- App: https://app.screenfusion.ai
- Contact: sales@screenfusion.ai | +353 44 967 2855

## Key Differentiators
- AI demographic profiling (GDPR-compliant)
- Native Canva integration
- Touchscreen web app builder (no-code)
- Dynamic pricing via Google Sheets
- Multi-language support (17 languages)
- Google Serverless infrastructure (99.9% uptime)
- Real-time multi-site deployment

## Platforms Supported
Android OS 5+, Amazon FireTV, WebOS Signage, Windows, Linux, Raspberry Pi, ChromeOS, Web browsers

## Industries Served
Retail, Hospitality, Healthcare, Education, Restaurants & Cafes, Real Estate, Corporate, Gym & Fitness, DOOH Advertising

## Pricing
- Free 14-day trial (no credit card required)
- Pro: €13.99 per screen/month
- Business: €168 per screen/year (1 month free)
